modName: Golden Gods Shrines -- BCF and BAIN Wizard
summary: This is a BAIN Conversion File packed with a Wizard script for installation using Wrye Bash (Smash). This requires Psychosteves Golden Gods Shrines v1.1 [b][color=orange](NOT the manual install version)[/color][/b]!
descriptionHtml:
This \"mod\" requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url], so the reader will need to [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:Wrye_Bash]acquaint him/herself with that modding utility[/url] before making use of this resource.

The [size=large][b][color=orange]BAIN Conversion File & Wizard[/color][/b][/size] are specifically targeted to the [url=http://forum.step-project.com][size=large][b]STEP Community[/b][/size][/url]; however, it is 100% applicable to all users. I augmented the BCF with several of Phsychosteves images and the wizard itself provides detail on every install option.

REMEMBER: Users will need to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6538]download Psychosteves Golden Gods Shrines v1.1[/url] [b][color=orange](NOT the manual install version)[/color][/b] in order tu use this BCF and wizard!

To use the BCF, 
[list=1][*]Extract B_Golden Gods Shrines_BAIN-v1.1-6538-BCF.7z into the [i]Bash Installers/Bain Converters[/i] (Psychosteves Golden Gods Shrines v1.1 goes into [i]Bash Installers[/i]).
[*]Launch Wrye Bash, click on the Installers tab.
[*]Select Psychosteves mod package, right click and choose Conversions > Apply > B_Golden Gods Shrines_BAIN-v1.1-6538-BCF.
[*]Right click on the newly-configured BAIN installer and select \"Wizard\" or \"Auto Wizard\" to start up the installer.
[*]Install the mod, done.
[/list]
Thanks to Psychosteve for creating this mod, without which, I\'d have had no good reason to produce this package ... enjoy!

=================== VERSION NISTORY ===================

Version 1.2
[list]
[*]Updated the BCF to fix breakage due (to Nexus file manipulation?)
[/list]
Version 1.1
[list]
[*]Updated the wizard in my own anal fashion.
[*]Added descriptions for nearly every option and updated the script.
[*]Updated some of the images using assets packed with the mod.
[/list]
Version 1.0
Initial release.
author: z929669

files.name: Golden Gods Shrines BCF and BAIN Wizard
